adrFormatAddress: 11 Riverside Dr, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: From my first session with Susan I became a Pilates devotee. Her passion is infectious. Susan brings both fun and innovation to group and one on one sessions. Susan is great and assessing and focusing on each individuals strengths and weaknesses. Since Susan is very flexible with scheduling she makes it easy for me to find the time for Pilates. I am lucky to have her at 11 Riverside Drive.

text.text: From my first session with Susan I became a Pilates devotee. Her passion is infectious. Susan brings both fun and innovation to group and one on one sessions. Susan is great and assessing and focusing on each individuals strengths and weaknesses. Since Susan is very flexible with scheduling she makes it easy for me to find the time for Pilates. I am lucky to have her at 11 Riverside Drive.

originalText.text:
I have been training with Susan for five months now. I reached out to Susan after suffering back pain. I tried everything from Chiropractic to Acupuncture, and nothing seemed to work for the long term - it was a an elongated maintenance, and it was frustrating.

After working with Susan I immediately felt stronger and much more agile. I've been doing sports all my life, and never excelled at flexibility or core stability - this new world was pretty new to me. It hasn't been easy - the trainings have been tough, and it took some time for myself to understand how my body communicates and how to fire certain muscles. Susan has been very supportive and encouraging, and pushed me to challenge myself. Most importantly, Susan always kept a very close eye about everything that I do, and made sure that I wasn't trying to injure myself.

I would recommend Susan to everyone - she truly is a great teacher, trainer and person. She would treat you with such care and dedication that you could not fall in love with pilates.

originalText.text: Susan is an outstanding teacher and coach.  She gets our strengths and weaknesses and works tirelessly to strengthen, stretch and tone muscles I never knew I had.  My body has definitely changed for the better since I started working with Susan.  My posture is better, I'm taller and toner overall. Susan is gentle, kind, caring, and demanding.  She quickly assed muscles I need to strengthen and stretch and tailored her coaching appropriately.  Susan is a knowledgeable coach who will transform your body in partnership with you.

originalText.text: I started working with Susan over the summer.  She has been great at working with my lack of strong core muscles.  I'm happy to say we have recently rediscovered my core and it is getting stronger every week.  She adjusts the program to your needs which has been very helpful.  She cares and really wants you to succeed as it shows with her enthusiastic approach to each session.

originalText.text: Susan is an amazing pilates instructor.  I have really benefited from her lessons and feel that I am in much better condition than I've been for a very long time.  She creates a program that works for your particular level of endurance and pushes you each time, but ever so gently so you feel as if you've made a major accomplishment.  Kudos.
